snippet: Uncapped Benfica goalkeeper Ederson has been called into the Brazilian squad for World Cup qualifiers against Uruguay and Paraguay later this month, national coach Tite said on Friday....

headline.main: Mourinho Says Rooney to Everton Talk Is 'Nonsense'
headline.print_headline: Mourinho Says Rooney to Everton Talk Is 'Nonsense'

lead_paragraph: Uncapped Benfica goalkeeper Ederson has been called into the Brazilian squad for World Cup qualifiers against Uruguay and Paraguay later this month, national coach Tite said on Friday.
